plot outline: The film is based on the intense lifelong struggle of a villager who has dedicated and sacrificed everything to a primary school in his remote village. The story spans long years of struggle from past to present times, where nothing has changed much in the cultural perspectives of small farmers.
title: Majhi Shaala
plot: The film is based on the intense lifelong struggle of a villager who has dedicated and sacrificed everything to a primary school in his remote village. The story spans long years of struggle from past to present times, where nothing has changed much in the cultural perspectives of small farmers.
